description:
A Gunpla built by Seiho Academy student government president Yuuki Tatsuya, also known as the Crimson Comet. Tatsuya`s building and piloting skills combine to create an unbeatable foe. Based on the MSV High Mobility Model Zaku II, it`s also been unarmored and equipped with fixed weaponry. Its mix between ranged and melee power make it a potent contender on any battleground.
Source: Official Website
name: MS-06R-AB Zaku Amazing
